title: New iPad 9.7 (2017) review
description:
The new Apple iPad (2017) is a 9.7-inch tablet that replaces the iPad Air 2. The best thing about it? The price, starting at just $329 for a real, full iPad tablet. It's not as fancy as the iPad Pro, but it's more than enough for most people. Here's where you can check it out for yourself:
